content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position=x=117.5, y=-30.5), boiler(position=x=111.5, y=-32.0), offshore pump(position=x=107.5, y=-33.5), and small electric pole(position=x=119.5, y=-30.5)

### Copper plate mine at no position
No copper plate mine structure has been created yet.

### Copper cable factory at no position
No copper cable factory structure has been created yet.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using insert_item
- Make sure to place the inserter near an entity that can accept the item before attempting to insert items.
### Errors when getting entities
- Ensure the entity exists at the specified position before attempting to get it.
### Errors when using get_entity
- Make sure the entity type matches the one at the specified position.
### Errors when using Prototype objects
- Ensure the first argument is an Entity or Prototype object.

### NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
* Important variables:
  - transport-belt: int
  - small-electric-pole: int
  - stone-furnace: int
  - wood: int
  - coal: int
  - copper-ore: int
  - iron-plate: int
  - copper-plate: int
  - copper-cable: int
  - iron-gear-wheel: int
  - burner-inserter: int
